name: Getyourglitchon
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: get your glitch on
des:
Alexa, get your glitch on!

We be glitch'n the wisdom.

With all the hysteria of internet personalities and the latest games crazes, it is hard these days to appreciate the great people in history who have so much to offer. Now you can use this skill to impress your friends with a cool Alexa trick and at the same time, maybe, just maybe spark their interest in a great historical figure.

The skill has been launched exclusively with the quotes of Benjamin Franklin and will be updated in the future with glitched up quotes from other amazing people of history.

To get a glitched quote just yell out "Alexa, get your glitch on". Each time you request a quote the skill will send a card to your Alexa app so you can see the exact wording of the quote and who said it (as sometimes the glitch can render the words indecipherable). After you get a glitched quote Alexa will ask if you want another, say "Yes" (or "another glitch") for another one and "No" to exit the skill.

Leave feedback or contact steven.bowden@protonmail.com with other historical figures you'd like to have glitched (their quotes will need to be public domain in terms of copyright).

Privacy information
This skill does not collect any personal information from customers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
